jobs.title: Web Development Intern
jobs.description: Join our web development team as an intern and gain hands-on experience in modern web technologies.
requirements: Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Familiarity with React is a plus
Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science or related field

jobs.title: QA Testing Intern
jobs.description: Learn software testing methodologies and gain practical experience in quality assurance.
requirements: Basic understanding of software testing principles
Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science or related field
